ygData.subject: Move over Megatron, Megaton's taking over.
ygData.msgSnippet: Veratis sits back and watches as the protoform continues to grow. If this keeps up it ll overload the system ?Foxfingers calls out. The protoform continued

Subject: Move over Megatron, Megaton's taking over.

 Veratis sits back and watches as the protoform continues to 
grow. "If this keeps up it'll overload the system" ?Foxfingers calls 
out. The protoform continued to grow and gain the shape of a dragon. 
Suddenly it became solid and a flash of energy surged through the 
lab. The labs computer systems flashed like the start of a 
thunderstorm as an increbably large object took shape in the middle 
of the room.

"I've done it, he's alive, Alive" (Sorry I couldn't help myself) The 
scientist had done it. The dragon was the biggest thing he'd seen 
since the old Autobots and Decepticons roamed cybertron. "Shut down 
the system before it explodes." He shouted to be heard over the 
crackling energy around them.

The computer was shut down and the room came to a sudden calm. "It's 
huge were the only words to escape the lips of Veratis' young 
assistant.

The dragon growled and lowered it's head. "Who are you to stand 
before my greatness?" it's booming voice echoed through the dark lab 
ending the previous lull of silence.

"I am Veratis, your creator, and this is Foxfingers. Welcome to this 
world." The scientists idea was that the Maximal attitudes would give 
the creature a sense of purpose, he could now tell that he was wrong.

"You say you created me?" the Dragon looked back and fourth at the 
two mouthfulls in front of it, it wasn't impressed. The dragon 
transformed and now a large T rex stood looking down on them. "In 
that case You both can live." his eyes rolled down at the seemingly 
tiny scientist, "I suppose I owe you that much."

He turned and started toward the door pausing to duck a little before 
opening his mouth and launching a beam of concentrated energy at it. 
The energy struck the door freezing it into a brittle state. "I owed 
you my life, as long as you don't interfere in it I'll consider 
myself in your debt, I'm letting you live, consider it payed." The 
mighty beast spun around, smashing the door to tiny splinters. He 
walked out giving his word. "You have the word of Megaton."
